sentences.sContent: But one of them, a shopkeeper was sad.
sentences.sContent_eng: But one of them, a shopkeeper was sad.
sentences.sCn: 但他们其中的一个，一位店主有点沮丧。

sentences.sContent: The girl had only worked for the shopkeeper for three days when she packed him in.
sentences.sContent_eng: The girl had only worked for the shopkeeper for three days when she packed him in.
sentences.sCn: 这姑娘替那店主只干了三天， 就辞职不干了。

sentences.sContent: In Jermyn Street in London, a shopkeeper anxiously asked who the next president would be.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Jermyn Street in London, a shopkeeper anxiously asked who the next president would be.
sentences.sCn: 在伦敦的杰明街，一个店主焦急地问道，谁将是（美国）下一任总统。

trans.tranOther: someone who owns or is in charge of a small shop
